title: selena:_tempest_(pgr)
body:
The Uniframe of [[Selena (pgr)|]] from [[Punishing: Gray Raven]]. Namesake is the stage play written by William Shakespeare, The Tempest.

h4. Appearance
Selena has [[purple eyes]] and [[very long hair|very long]] [[straight hair|straight]] [[black hair]], has features like [[single sidelock]] (left side), [[blunt bangs]], [[colored inner hair]] ([[blue hair|blue]] or [[red hair|red]] inner), hair [[parted hair|parts]] into two at the lower back. Her hair is adorned with a single [[hair ribbon]] on the right side, wears a pair of [[earrings]].

The Tempest frame has many [[mechabare]] and elements integrated into the body, she can be tagged as [[cyborg]] depending on the level of mechanical details depicted. Both arms are [[mechanical arms|mechanical]] as well as her left [[mechanical legs|leg]] ([[single mechanical leg]]), both feet are [[mechanical foot|mechanical]], but depending on depiction, right foot might look like a [[black footwear|black]] [[boots|boot]] ([[asymmetrical footwear]]). Has [[robot joints]] at her elbow, wrist, knee and ankle.

Her apparel is a [[black dress|black]] [[armored dress]], with [[puffy long sleeves]], a [[black bow|black]] [[waist bow]], and skirt with [[pleated skirt|pleated]] design. No other apparel on the lower body.

Depending on awakening level of the character depicted, her hair ribbon can be replaced by two [[hairclip]]s, and her skirt armor plates can be depicted [[glowing armor|glowing]]. She uses a weaponized [[cello]] in combat, but the acoustic chamber is missing entirely, and the endpin is a blade. Also carries the [[bow (music)|bow]] to play the cello.

h4. List of Alternate Coatings ([[official alternate costume|alternative costumes]])
* [[selena: tempest (nightingale and rose) (pgr)|Nightingale and Rose]]
* [[selena: tempest (aria of nymph) (pgr)|Aria of Nymph]]

h4. External links
* "GrayRavens wiki - Selena: Tempest Gallery":[https://grayravens.com/wiki/Selena:_Tempest/Gallery]

body: [[Official alternate costume]] for [[Lucia: Crimson Abyss (pgr)|]].

title: selena:_tempest_(nightingale_and_rose)_(pgr)
body: [[Official alternate costume]] for [[Selena: Tempest (pgr)|]].

title: lucia:_dawn_(gothic)_(pgr)
body:
An [[official alternate costume|alternate coating]] of [[Lucia (pgr)|]]'s [[lucia: dawn (pgr)|Dawn frame]]. [[Monochrome]] in coloration and [[cyborg]] in appearance.

Gothic coating has the exact same hair style as the Dawn frame, [[twintails]], [[double-parted bangs]] and [[long hair|long length]], though it is now entirely monochrome [[grey hair|grey]], the mechanical [[headgear]] above each twintails is replaced with two spikes that is [[obsidian rock|obsidian]] in appearance, the amount of [[x hair ornament]]s increased to five.

[[Grey eyes]], body has even lesser biological features, all four limbs are mechanical, both [[mechanical arms]] connects at the shoulder, both [[mechanical legs]] connects at the waist, [[mechanical foot|mechanical feet]] has built in high heels and limited ground contact area, possibly qualifies for [[fewer digits]] tag. Very exposed [[mechabare]] are on display, [[robot joints|robotic (ball) joints]] are visible at the shoulder, waist, knee and ankle, hinge joints at the elbow connects upper arm and forearm. A special device connects her [[katana]] to the back of her left forearm. A pair of [[low wings|lower back]] [[mechanical wings]] is present, but they are oriented to the left and can give off the impression of [[single wing]].

Very limited fabric can be found on the Gothic coating, a [[frilled collar|frilled]] [[detached collar]], a [[see-through skirt|see-through]] [[high-waist skirt]] with a lower back cutout, upper section of [[lace-trimmed thighhighs]] can be seen. Faint markings of [[barcode]]s can be found on her right thigh ([[leg tattoo]]) and on her left breast's fabric.

title: selena:_capriccio_(irisfall_ballad)_(pgr)
body:
An [[official alternate costume|alternate coating]] of [[Selena (pgr)|]]'s [[selena: capriccio (pgr)|Capriccio frame]].

A coating released with the Capriccio frame itself, Irisfall Ballad is a formal [[white dress|white]] [[backless dress]] with [[detached collar|detached]] [[white collar]] with [[frilled skirt]] with a band of [[see-through skirt layer]]  underneath. Other clothing elements such as a [[blue bow|blue]] [[back bow]] that is detached and floating, and a pair of [[white gloves]].

Has similar physical appearance as the default coating, Irisfall Ballad kept her [[purple eyes]] and [[black hair]], hair style is now a [[updo]] [[hair bun]] with [[side braid]]s, adorned with [[pearl hair ornament|pearl]] and [[feather hair ornament]]s, wears a [[single earring|single]] [[floating earring|dangle earring]] with [[pearl earrings|pearl]] [[blue gemstone]] and a [[cross earrings|cross]] ornament. On top of her left arm being [[single mechanical arm|mechanical]], her right leg now also [[single mechanical leg|mechanical]].

title: lamia:_lost_lullaby_(pgr)
body: A playable frame of [[Lamia (pgr)|]].

title: lucia:_lotus_(pgr)
body:
A frame of [[Lucia (pgr)|]] from [[Punishing: Gray Raven]].

h4. Appearance
Lotus can be identified by [[red eyes]], [[long hair|long]] [[black hair]] with [[red hair|red]] [[streaked hair|streaks]] and [[gradient hair|gradient hair colour]] (red tips to black roots), [[double-parted bangs]], [[hair between eyes]] and two [[low-tied sidelocks]]. She wears a [[red scarf]], a [[black shirt]] with [[long sleeves]] (that exposes a [[midriff]] depending on awakening level), a [[black skirt|black]] [[pleated skirt]], and [[black pantyhose]] or [[black thighhighs|black]]/[[red thighhighs|red thighhigh]] depending on awakening level.

h4. List of Alternate Coatings ([[official alternate costume|alternative costumes]])
* [[lucia: lotus (gray feathers: lotus) (punishing: gray raven)|Gray Feathers: Lotus]]
* [[lucia: lotus (daybreak) (pgr)|Daybreak]]
* [[lucia: lotus (rain walking) (pgr)|Rain Walking]]

h4. External links
* "GrayRavens wiki - Lucia: Lotus Gallery":[https://grayravens.com/wiki/Lucia:_Lotus/Gallery]

title: selena:_tempest_(aria_of_nymph)_(pgr)
body: [[Official alternate costume]] for [[Selena: Tempest (pgr)|]].

title: lucia:_lotus_(rain_walking)_(pgr)
body:
An [[official alternate costume|alternate coating]] of [[Lucia (pgr)|]]'s [[lucia: lotus (pgr)|Lotus frame]].

The Rain Walking coating retains all the hair features that of the Lotus frame except for the low tied sidelocks being replaced, [[red eyes]], [[long hair|long]] [[black hair]] with [[red hair|red]] [[streaked hair|streaks]] and [[double-parted bangs]]. The coating has a set of new [[headgear]]s which projects two short [[holographic horns|holographic]] [[red horns]], [[doll joints]] can be seen on her knee, wrist and finger joints.

Her outfit consist of two layers. Inner layer is a [[black dress|black]] and [[red dress|red]] [[short dress]] with a [[v-neck]] design and [[gradient sleeves|gradient]] [[long sleeves]]. Outer layer is a [[see-through jacket]] (or [[raincoat]]) with a noticeably big [[zipper pull tab]] and the Gray Raven [[emblem]] printed on the back. No clothing on her lower body except for her [[black footwear|black]] and [[red footwear]].

title: noan:_arca_(pgr)
body:
A frame of [[Noan (pgr)|]] from [[Punishing: Gray Raven]], [[cyborg]] in appearance.

h4. Appearance
[[short_hair|Short]] [[grey hair|dark grey hair]] with [[streaked hair|white streaks]] and [[yellow eyes]], he wears a pair of [[glasses]] with a [[semi-rimless eyewear|half rimmed]] design. Right arm is [[bandaged arm|bandaged]] while his left arm is [[mechanical arms|mechanical]], exposed [[mechabare]] and augments on his torso and neck making up the cyborg appearance. Uses Rev Blades (set of two [[sword]]s, one [[long sword|long]] and one [[short sword|short]]) as weapons.

h4. List of Alternate Coatings ([[official alternate costume|alternative costumes]])
* [[noan: arca (homecoming) (pgr)|Homecoming]]

h4. External links
* "GrayRavens wiki - Noan: Arca Gallery":[https://grayravens.com/wiki/Noan:_Arca/Gallery]

title: no._21:_feral_scent_(pgr)
body: A playable frame of [[No. 21 (pgr)|]].

title: haicma:_starveil_(pgr)
body:
A frame of [[Haicma (pgr)|]] from [[Punishing: Gray Raven]], [[cyborg]] in appearance.

h4. Appearance
Haicma's Starveil frame is entirely [[mechabare|mechanical]], but it is far more streamlined and can look similar to wearing a [[skin tight]] black/grey [[bodysuit]]. She has [[white hair]] in the style of [[short hair with long locks]], [[parted bangs]] and a [[single hair bun]]. [[Yellow eyes]] with four [[mole under eye|moles under eyes]]. All four of her limbs are mechanical, showing obvious [[robot joints|robotic joints]] at her elbow and wrist on her [[mechanical arms]] and [[mechanical hands]]. Her [[mechanical foot|feet]] is unusual, the ground contacting area is very small, giving off the impression as if she is standing/walking on [[tiptoes]] but with no digits present, possibly eligible for [[fewer digits]] or [[ballet boots]] tag.

Her outfit is a [[white dress|white]] [[strapless dress]] with [[side slit]]s on both sides similar to a [[china dress]], the dress itself is also skin tight (eligible for [[impossible dress]]) to a state where her [[covered navel]] and [[ribs]] can be partially seen under the fabrics, the bottom part of her dress turns partially [[see-through clothes|transparent]]. She is sometimes depicted with a white [[bonnet]] hat with electrical [[cable]]s attached near the rear. Two [[hairclip]]s can be found on her left sidelock above her left eye.

She uses a [[huge weapon|large]] [[scythe]] as her [[polearm]] weapon. Is occasionally depicted with [[blue butterfly|blue butterflies]].

h4. List of Alternate Coatings ([[official alternate costume|alternative costumes]])
* [[haicma: starveil (fantastical fellowship) (pgr)|Fantastical Fellowship]]

h4. External link
* "GrayRavens wiki - Haicma: Starveil Gallery":[https://grayravens.com/wiki/Haicma:_Starveil/Gallery]

title: lucia:_lotus_(daybreak)_(pgr)
body:
An [[official alternate costume|alternate coating]] of [[Lucia: Lotus (pgr)|]], she has the same physical characteristics as Lotus.

h4. Apparel
Daybreak coating consist of a [[high collar]] [[red bodysuit]] that exposes her [[underboob]], wearing a pair of [[black gloves|black]] [[elbow gloves|elbow high]] [[fingerless gloves]]. Also fitted with metallic [[knee pads]].

title: pulao:_dragontoll_(pgr)
body:
A frame of [[Pulao (pgr)|]] from [[Punishing: Gray Raven]].

h4. Appearance
Short and [[petite]], Dragontoll is the playable version of Pulao, she has [[black hair]] and [[red eyes]], her sidelocks are tied into two [[hair rings]], she has a [[one side up]] on the left tied by a [[lantern hair ornament|lantern]], and the overall length of her hair is [[long hair|long]], usually depicted with a [[ahoge]]. Both of her arms are [[mechanical arms|mechanical]].

Her clothing element consist of two pieces. A [[white]] [[cropped jacket]] with a [[calligraphy]] character '蒲'  written on the back, and has [[cloud print]]. And a [[black dress|black]] (or [[brown dress|brown]]) [[backless dress|backless]] [[short dress]], the dress itself has [[side slit]]s on both sides and a [[Chinese knot]] on the left side, under the side slits her [[lowleg panties|lowleg]] [[white panties]] are visible. She wears either a [[black footwear|black]] or [[white footwear|white]] [[thigh boots]].

She uses [[martial arts]] in combat but also wields a [[floating weapon|floating]] [[dao]] (if depicted properly) as a weapon, the dao itself is bigger than Pulao ([[huge weapon]]). Her NPC appearance has the cropped jacket being replaced by a [[white cape]].

h4. List of Alternate Coatings ([[official alternate costume|alternative costumes]])
* [[pulao: dragontoll (dragonwood) (pgr)|Dragonwood]]
* [[pulao: dragontoll (dreamweaver) (pgr)|Dreamweaver]]

* "GrayRavens wiki - Pulao: Dragontoll Gallery":[https://grayravens.com/wiki/Pulao:_Dragontoll/Gallery]

title: noan_(pgr)
body:
A NPC and later on playable character of [[Punishing: Gray Raven]], a Transcendent who joined Babylonia, prior to becoming a Uniframe Construct, he was associated with the Forsaken <spoiler>and used the fake alias 'Shrek'</spoiler>. Voiced by [[Ishikawa Kaito]].

h4. Appearance
Noan has [[short hair|short]] [[grey hair|dark grey hair]] with [[streaked hair|white streaks]] and [[yellow eyes]], he wears a pair of [[glasses]] with a [[semi-rimless eyewear|half rimmed]] design.

His NPC appearance had short [[brown hair]], eyes are usually obstructed by the glare of his [[goggles]].

h4. List of playable frames of Noan
* [[noan: arca (pgr)|Noan: Arca]]

title: haicma_(pgr)
body:
Haicma ('Haik-ma', or as spoken in Japanese: 'Hakama') is a playable character of [[Punishing: Gray Raven]], an Uniframe construct, differs from other Babylonia Constructs, Haicma is not a human converted into a Construct, but a machine from the start, she is associated with the Church of Machina under the title 'Hermit'. Voiced by [[Tanaka Rie]].

h4. Appearance
Haicma is [[cyborg]] in appearance with very little biological features. Her figure is tall and slender, [[white hair]] of [[medium hair|medium]] or [[long hair|long]] length, she has [[yellow eyes]] and four [[mole under eye|moles under eyes]], with two below [[mole under each eye|each eye]].

h4. List of playable frames of Haicma
* [[haicma: starveil (pgr)|Haicma: Starveil]]

title: pulao:_dragontoll_(dreamweaver)_(pgr)
body: [[Official alternate costume]] for [[Pulao: Dragontoll (pgr)|]].

title: karenina:_ember_(silver_white)_(pgr)
body:
An [[official alternate costume|alternate coating]] of [[Karenina (pgr)|]]'s [[karenina: ember (pgr)|Ember frame]].

Released as part of the Oathbound series, the Silver White coating has the exact same hair style as the default Ember coating, keeping her [[white hair]] styled with [[twin drills]], has a pair of ball shaped and [[heart hair ornament]]s attached on her drills. She retains her [[yellow eyes|yellow]]/[[orange eyes]], mechanical elements of her body includes [[mechanical legs]].

The outfit itself is a [[white dress|white]] [[halter dress]], where the neckpiece is a piece of reflective fabric similar to the default Ember frame, the dress itself also has a [[see-through cape|see-through]] [[waist cape]]. The outfit also came with [[long sleeves|long]] [[puffy detached sleeves]] and [[black gloves|black]] [[partially fingerless gloves]].

title: lucia:_crimson_weave_(zhuolu's_rain)_(pgr)
body: [[Official alternate costume]] for [[Lucia: Crimson Weave (pgr)|]].

title: karenina:_ember_(gray_feathers:_ember)_(pgr)
body: [[Official alternate costume]] for [[Karenina: Ember (pgr)|]].

title: pulao:_dragontoll_(dragonwood)_(pgr)
body: [[Official alternate costume]] for [[Pulao: Dragontoll (pgr)|]].

title: karenina:_blast_(pgr)
body:
A frame of [[Karenina (pgr)|]] from [[Punishing: Gray Raven]].

h4. Appearance
Karenina's Blast frame has [[white hair|white]]/[[blonde hair|blonde]] [[short hair with long locks]], with [[swept bangs]] and [[orange eyes]]. She has [[fake animal ears|fake]] [[mechanical]] [[cat ears]] on her head, typically hidden beneath her [[hood]]. 

Blast frame's Apparels include a [[black unitard|black]] [[unitard]], a [[black jacket|black]] [[hooded jacket]] with orange inner linings. The hood itself has a pair of [[large horns]] making it a [[horned hood]]. She is [[bare legs|bare legged]], wearing nothing on her lower body except for [[black footwear]]. Other apparels includes [[dog tags]] and an [[orange armband]]. She can be depicted [[hood down]], with a [[black scarf]] and her unitard replaced with [[black shorts]] and a [[black sports bra]], depending on awakening level. Carries a large [[cannon]] barrel as her weapon.

There is an alternative design of Blast, where the bodysuit has a large central [[argyle cutout|argyle]] [[clothing cutout|cutout]] exposing [[underboob]], [[stomach]] and [[navel]].

h4. List of Alternate Coatings ([[official alternate costume|alternative costumes]])
* [[karenina: blast (gray feathers: blast) (punishing: gray raven)|Gray Feathers: Blast]]
* [[karenina: blast (crack n blast) (pgr)|Crack 'n Blast]]

h4. External links
* "GrayRavens wiki - Karenina: Blast Gallery":[https://grayravens.com/wiki/Karenina:_Blast/Gallery]

title: pulao_(pgr)
body:
Pulao (pinyin: Pǔ Láo), a character of [[Punishing: Gray Raven]]. Debuted as a NPC during the 'Nona Ouroboros' patch, and later on became a playable Uniframe construct in the 'Reveries with a Whale' patch. Her real name is <spoiler>Yoyo</spoiler>, she took on the name of the policing/security crew of the Kowloong Nighter, 'Pulao', as her name. Voiced by [[Naganawa Maria]].

h4. Appearance
More [[petite]] in appearance amongst playable Constructs, Pulao is typically depicted with [[black hair|black]] or [[brown hair]] with [[red eyes]]. All of her official appearances have oriental themed clothes ([[chinese clothes]]).

h4. List of playable frames of Pulao
* [[pulao: dragontoll (pgr)|Pulao: Dragontoll]]

title: karenina:_blast_(crack_n_blast)_(pgr)
body: [[Official alternate costume]] for [[Karenina: Blast (pgr)|]].

title: lucia:_plume_(pgr)
body:
A frame of [[Lucia (pgr)|]] from [[Punishing: Gray Raven]].

h4. Appearance
Plume is identified by her [[red eyes]], two [[mechanical arms|mechanical forearms]], two [[mechanical legs]] fitted up to mid thighs. She has [[long hair]] in the form of [[twintails]], which are [[multicolored hair|multicolored]] [[gradient hair]], from red tips to black roots. Also has [[sidelocks]] and [[hair between eyes|bangs between eyes]]. Apparels include [[fake horns]], mechanical [[arm guards]] on both arms, a large [[long sleeves|long sleeved]] [[black jacket]] with red linings, inside is a [[black dress]].

h4. List of Alternate Coatings ([[official alternate costume|alternative costumes]])
* [[lucia: plume (eventide glow) (pgr)|Eventide Glow]]

body: The Uniframe of [[Roland (pgr)|]] from [[Punishing: Gray Raven]].

title: rosetta:_rigor_(howling_crown)_(pgr)
body: [[Official alternate costume]] for [[Rosetta: Rigor (pgr)|]].

title: vera:_rozen_(agony_break)_(pgr)
body:
An [[official alternate costume|alternate coating]] of [[Vera (pgr)|]]'s [[vera: rozen (pgr)|Rozen frame]].

A [[nurse]] themed [[halloween costume]] for the Rozen frame, highly mechanical in appearance with the left arm ([[single mechanical arm]]) and both legs as [[mechanical legs|mechanical]]. Keeping her [[long hair|long]] [[straight hair]] but hair colour is now [[gradient hair|gradient]] with [[red hair|red]] roots to [[white hair|white]] tips, [[parted hair|hair parts]] into two halves at the lower end. Left eye is [[one eye covered|covered]] by a [[medical eyepatch]], but blood can be seen dripping down ([[blood from eyes]], [[blood on face]]). Wears a [[nurse cap]] and a [[white ribbon|white]] [[hair ribbon]] on the back.

The outfit is a [[blood on clothes|blood stained]] [[torn bodysuit|torn]] [[backless bodysuit|backless]] [[white bodysuit]], no clothing on the lower body except for the [[bandaged leg|bandaged right leg]]. Left sleeve is [[torn sleeve|torned]] and exposes the mechanical arm, sleeves has puffy shoulders ([[juliet sleeves]]). A [[blood bag]] is taped on to her stomach, a pair of [[surgical scissors]], a [[scalpel]] and a [[syringe]] are taped to her right forearm.

title: rosetta:_rigor_(niki_us1000)_(pgr)
body:
An [[official alternate costume|alternate coating]] of [[Rosetta (pgr)|]]'s [[Rosetta: Rigor (pgr)|Rigor frame]].

While still retaining a mostly mechanical body like her default appearance, several elements are changed, Niki is a racing themed coating, her [[cyborg]] body is painted mostly in black white and red, with various [[decal]]s painted on her body. The only biological feature is her head, with a new [[bob cut]] hair style and an orange [[streaked hair|streak]].

title: ring_sidelocks
body:
[[Sidelocks]] that are visibly tied into [[hair rings]].

h4. Notable characters

* [[Impa]] from [[The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild]] 
* [[Pulao (pgr)|]] from [[Punishing: Gray Raven]]

h4. See also

* [[Sidelocks tied back]]

title: wanshi:_lucid_dreamer_(pgr)
body: A playable frame of [[Wanshi (pgr)|]].

title: karenina:_scire_(pgr)
body:
A frame of [[Karenina (pgr)|]] from [[Punishing: Gray Raven]].

h4. Appearance
Karenina has [[yellow eyes|yellow]]/[[orange eyes]] and [[white hair]] with her Scire frame, her hair style has [[twintails]] at the back, [[swept bangs]] and shoulder length [[sidelocks]], overall hair length is [[medium hair|medium]]. The [[mechanical]] [[hair ornament]]s that ties her twintails together can flip upwards and resemble [[fake animal ears]]. All four limbs are mechanical, both of her [[mechanical arms]] connects just above the elbow [[robot joints|joints]], her [[mechanical legs]] are hidden well by her [[thigh boots]], exposing only the mechanical knee joints at the back and [[mechanical foot|mechanical feet]].

The Scire frame has an overall slim appearance with her [[skin tight]] [[black bodysuit|black]] and [[white bodysuit]], the bodysuit itself is of a [[backless bodysuit|backless]] design, with [[armpit cutout]]s. The abdomen section of the bodysuit can be depicted with white fabrics instead, she is also sometimes depicted with [[black pantyhose]] with [[thigh cutout]] design, depending on frame's awakening level.

She uses a transformable [[war hammer]] as her [[huge weapon|weapon]].

h4. List of Alternate Coatings ([[official alternate costume|alternative costumes]])
* [[karenina: scire (maleficent) (pgr)|Maleficent]]

h4. External links
* "GrayRavens wiki - Karenina: Scire Gallery":[https://grayravens.com/wiki/Karenina:_Scire/Gallery]

title: karenina:_scire_(maleficent)_(pgr)
body:
An [[official alternate costume|alternate coating]] of [[Karenina (pgr)|]]'s [[karenina: scire (pgr)|Scire frame]]. [[Cyborg]] in appearance.

The Maleficent coating retains much of the physical bodily appearance of the original Scire design with slight additions, [[yellow eyes|yellow]] / [[orange eyes]], her hair style remains to be [[medium hair|medium length]] [[white hair|white]] / [[grey hair]] with [[twintails]], [[swept bangs]], shoulder length [[sidelocks]], adorned with [[hair ornament]] such as [[x hair ornament]] on the left lock, a [[maid headdress]] and two [[scrunchie]] tying the twintails up. All four limbs are mechanical but with a different design, [[mechanical arms]] attaches just above the elbow, [[mechanical hands]] has very sharp fingers and resembles [[claws]], [[mechanical legs]] attaches just above the knee and [[mechanical foot]] has [[high heels]] incorporated into the design. [[robot joints|Robotic (ball shaped) joints]] can be found at the shoulder, elbow, wrist, knee and ankle joint, with the shoulder area exposing some of the internal torso [[mechabare]]. In addition to the mechanical limbs, she has an external skeletal [[mechanical spine]] that extends past her waist and becomes an [[mechanical tail]].

Her outfit consist of a [[white shirt]] with [[vertical-striped shirt|vertical stripes]] with a lower [[back cutout]] and [[sleeveless shirt|sleeveless]] design. A [[high-waist skirt|high-waist]] [[pleated skirt|pleated]] [[black skirt]] that cuts off around the higher thigh region, a different shade of fabric is [[patchwork clothes|patched]] onto the left side of the skirt. The non-mechanical section of her thighs wears [[black pantyhose]].

title: rosetta:_rigor_(einherjar)_(pgr)
body:
An [[official alternate costume|alternate coating]] of [[Rosetta (pgr)|]]'s [[Rosetta: Rigor (pgr)|Rigor frame]].

While still retaining a mostly mechanical body like her default appearance, several elements are changed, almost [[monochrome]] in coloration, the Einherjar coating is almost entirely black and white.

Hair colour is now more [[white hair|white]], center-flap bangs is now simply [[double-parted bangs]], eye colour changed from yellow to [[blue eyes|blue]] with [[horizontal pupils]], as well as the addition of dark brown [[eyeshadow]] makeup.

The Einherjar coating has a single [[mechanical wings|mechanical wings]] mounted on the left shoulder instead of both, the skin of her abdomen section is entirely [[see-through body|translucent]] and her [[mechanical spine]] is visible from the outside.

title: wanshi_(pgr)
body:
A playable character of [[Punishing: Gray Raven]], the support and sniper of the Strike Hawk team, appears tired and will sleep at any given opportunity, wishes he can sleep for 25 hours a day. Voiced by Ishida Akira.

h4. Appearance
Wanshi has [[blonde hair|blonde]] [[short hair]] with [[yellow eyes]], but has his left eye [[one eye covered|covered]] by his [[swept bangs]] ([[hair over one eye]]), also depicted with visible fatigue driven [[bags under eyes|eye bags]], and a [[mole under mouth]]. Uses a [[sniper rifle|sniper/marksmen rifle]] and a sidearm pistol [[handgun]] as his weapons.

h4. List of playable frames of Wanshi
* [[wanshi: hypnos (pgr)|Wanshi: Hypnos]]

title: vera:_rozen_(night_fever)_(pgr)
body:
An [[official alternate costume|alternate coating]] of [[Vera (pgr)|]]'s [[vera: rozen (pgr)|Rozen frame]].

Night Fever coating is a set of new apparels for the Rozen frame, no mechanical bodily features, as well as slight changes to her hair style. She still has [[long hair|long]] [[straight hair|straight]] [[red hair]], but the sidelocks are shorter and the hair no longer parts from behind. [[Red eyes]] with [[cross-shaped pupils]] and a [[mole under eye|mole under left eye]]. Left ear has a single [[earpiece]], right ear has a small [[hoop earrings]], headwear is a [[black headwear|black]] [[baseball cap]] with two [[horned headwear|horns]] on the sides and a white [[pom pom (clothes)|]] on top.

Her body clothes consist of a [[fishnet top|fishnet]] [[front-tie top]], a [[black jacket]] typically [[off shoulder|worn hanging off her arms]] with gold trims, a [[front slit]] [[pleated skirt|pleated]] [[black skirt]] and an [[asymmetrical pants|asymmetrical]] [[black leggings]]. Footwear is a pair of [[high heels|high heeled]] [[spiked boots|spiked]] [[black footwear|black]] [[ankle boots]], right leg has a [[single thighhigh|single]] [[pink thighhighs|pink thighhigh]] with [[star print]]s, the visible areas of the [[single sock|single]] left [[ankle socks]] is depicted [[torn socks|torned]].

title: lucia:_pyroath_(pgr)
body: A Frame of [[Lucia (pgr)|]] from [[Punishing: Gray Raven]].

title: wanshi:_hypnos_(pgr)
body:
A frame of [[Wanshi (pgr)|]] from [[Punishing: Gray Raven]].

h4. Appearance
In the Hypnos frame, Wanshi has [[short hair|short]] [[white hair]] that is usually [[unkempt]] or [[messy hair|messy]] (possibly [[cowlick]]s), he has [[yellow eyes]] but the left eye is [[one eye covered|covered]] by his [[hair over one eye|hair]]. Wears a [[sleep mask]] on his forehead, he is usually depicted tired, [[sleeping]] and/or has [[bags under eyes]]. Has a single [[mole under mouth]] (left chin) and two [[mechanical legs]] that attaches above the knee.

His apparels consist of a [[black undershirt|black]] [[undershirt]] with a [[white jacket|white]] [[open jacket]], the jacket's [[long sleeves]] can be coated in [[digital camouflage]] depending on awakening level of the character. Wears a pair of [[white pants]], with [[thigh strap]], [[thigh pouch]] and [[belt pouch]]. Other possible accessories including [[dog tags]], [[chest harness]] and a [[walkie-talkie]].

Uses a [[sniper rifle]] as main weapon and a pistol [[handgun]] as side arm.

h4. List of Alternate Coatings ([[official alternate costume|alternative costumes]])
* [[wanshi: hypnos (hawk scout) (pgr)|Hawk Scout]]

h4. External links
* "GrayRavens wiki - Wanshi: Hypnos Gallery":[https://grayravens.com/wiki/Wanshi:_Hypnos/Gallery]

title: karenina:_scire_(march_hare)_(pgr)
body: [[Official alternate costume]] for [[Karenina: Scire (pgr)|]].

title: rosetta_(pgr)
body:
An enemy boss and later on a playable character of [[Punishing: Gray Raven]], leader of the Forest Guards of the Arctic Route Union, a military <spoilers>penal</spoilers> unit made up of advanced quadrupedal Constructs. Voiced by Sawahiro Miyuki.

h4. Appearance
Rosetta's only playable appearance in-game is the [[rosetta: rigor (pgr)|Rigor]] frame, almost entirely [[mechabare|mechanical]] and [[cyborg]] in appearance. She has [[medium hair|medium]] [[white hair]] with [[center-flap bangs]] and two [[short twintails]] at the back, has [[yellow eyes]].

As a boss encounter, she is [[taur]]/[[centauroid]] in appearance (see post #6339663), with a large mechanical half body attached to the back of her hips, forming a horse-like body for the centaur appearance.

There exists an [[aged down]] version of Rosetta when she was still human. That depiction also has a similar hairstyle as the Construct appearance, but with [[two side up]] in the hair style instead of the twintails.

h4. List of playable frames of Rosetta
* [[rosetta: rigor (pgr)|Rosetta: Rigor]]

body: [[Official alternate costume]] for [[Wanshi (pgr)|]].

h4. Appearance

title: bianca:_zero_(pgr)
body:
A frame of [[Bianca (pgr)|]] from [[Punishing: Gray Raven]].

Bianca Zero has [[blonde hair]] and [[green eyes]], the hair style consist of [[double-parted bangs]], [[short hair with long locks|long locks]] and a braided bundle at the back. Other notable appearance tags are [[mole under eye|mole under left eye]] and [[large breasts]]. Though her hair style incorporates [[hair intakes]], it is usually hidden by the headwear.

Her apparel consists of a [[white shirt]], white [[fur trim|fur trimmed]] [[surcoat]], [[black skirt|black]] [[high-waist skirt]] and [[black leggings]] with [[argyle legwear|arygle patterns]]. Other notable apparels include [[black gloves]], white [[papakha]], [[high heels]] and [[thigh strap]]s.

Sometimes her outfit is depicted differently, with blue [[hat feather]]s on her papakha, embedded with [[medallion]]s, or the papakha being replaced all together with a [[shako cap]].

h4. See also

* [[bianca: zero (gray feathers: zero) (pgr)|Gray Feathers: Zero]]

h4. External links

* "GrayRavens Wiki: Bianca: Zero":[https://grayravens.com/wiki/Bianca:_Zero]

title: karenina_(pgr)
body:
A playable character of [[Punishing: Gray Raven]], part of the Babylonia Engineering force, frequently works together with various other departments/task forces of Babylonia, often referred to just as Karen. Voiced by [[Tomatsu Haruka]].

h4. Appearance
Karenina has a consistent depiction across her playable frames, all featuring [[white hair|white/platinum blonde hair]] though of various length and style, [[medium breasts]] and [[yellow eyes]]. Uses a heavy [[cannon]] as her weapon, while her Scire frame uses a large [[hammer]] instead.

h4. List of playable frames of Karenina
* [[karenina: blast (pgr)|Karenina: Blast]]

title: camu_(pgr)
body:
A boss and a playable character of [[Punishing: Gray Raven]], <spoilers>he is the alter-ego of [[Kamui (pgr)|]], he is now a Transcendant in the Strike Hawk team after being given an Uniframe by Babylonia.</spoilers> Voiced by Fukuyama Jun.

h4. Appearance
Camu has [[short hair|short]] [[grey hair]] and has [[purple eyes]], his left eye has [[black sclera]]. Also has a [[mechabare|mechanical]] device protruding above his right eye, similar to a [[fake horns|fake horn]]. Wields a [[two-handed]] [[greatsword]] as his weapon.

h4. List of playable frames of Camu
* [[camu: crocotta (pgr)|Camu: Crocotta]]

title: chrome:_glory_(pgr)
body:
A frame of [[Chrome (pgr)|]] from [[Punishing: Gray Raven]].

h4. Appearance
In the Glory frame, Chrome retains his [[short hair|short]] [[blonde hair]] and [[blue eyes]] appearance. Mostly biological in appearance, the only mechanical element on the Glory frame is the device on the back which resembles are pair of small [[mechanical wings]] and the external [[mechanical spine]].

His outfit consist of three layers, inner most is a [[white undershirt]]/[[t-shirt]], mid layer is a [[black jumpsuit]], outermost is a [[short sleeves|short sleeved]] [[black coat]] ([[open coat]]), the coat has [[see-through coat|see-through]] windows near the thigh region, left shoulder has a [[single shoulder pad]]. Wears a pair of black [[gauntlets]] and a pair of [[black gloves]], his [[black footwear|black]] [[thigh boots]] can look like [[armored boots]] as it has armor platings on the front.

Uses a [[gunblade]] as weapon.

h4. List of Alternate Coatings ([[official alternate costume|alternative costumes]])
* [[chrome: glory (honor model) (pgr)|Honor Model]]
* [[chrome: glory (nosferatu) (pgr)|Nosferatu]]

title: bianca:_stigmata_(pgr)
body:
A frame of [[Bianca (pgr)|]] from [[Punishing: Gray Raven]]. The defaut appearance of the Stigmata frame is actually a corroded version of the [[bianca: stigmata (exorcist) (pgr)|Exorcist coating]].

h4. Appearance
In her Stigmata frame her appearance is muted with colours somewhat washed off, she has [[bleached hair|bleached blonde]] / [[grey hair]], [[pale skin]] complexion, [[large breasts]] and dark [[purple eyes]]. Her hair style has a single long [[braided ponytail]], pushing her overall hair length to [[very long hair|very long]], wears a [[circlet]] as hair ornaments has [[hair intakes]]. Has a [[single earring|single]] [[cross earrings|cross earring]] on her left ear and a [[mole under eye|mole under right eye]].

Both of her arms are [[mechanical arms|mechanical]], left leg is [[mechanical legs|mechanical]], attached just above the knee ([[single mechanical leg]]), [[robot joints]] can be found at her elbow, left knee and ankles. Her body apparels consist of a [[backless bodysuit|backless]] [[black bodysuit]] with [[torn bodystocking]] on her shoulder and neck, the only remaining clothing from the Exorcist coating is an incomplete [[halterneck]] top, where only the front fabrics remain.

She uses a [[greatsword]] ([[zweihander]] if depicted properly) as her [[weapon]], and often seen carrying a mechanical [[lantern]].

h4. List of Alternate Coatings ([[official alternate costume|alternative costumes]])
* [[bianca: stigmata (exorcist) (pgr)|Exorcist]]
* [[bianca: stigmata (solitary dream) (pgr)|Snow Petals]] <tn>*Name subject to change upon global release</tn>

h4. External links
* "GrayRavens wiki - Bianca: Stigmata Gallery":[https://grayravens.com/wiki/Bianca:_Stigmata/Gallery]

title: chrome:_arclight_(pgr)
body:
A frame of [[Chrome (pgr)|]] from [[Punishing: Gray Raven]].

h4. Appearance
In the Arclight frame, Chrome retains his [[short hair|short]] [[blonde hair]] and [[blue eyes]] appearance, wears a single [[earpiece]] on his left ear.

His apparels consist of a [[bodysuit]] as innerwear ([[bodysuit under clothes]]), and a long [[white robe]] with [[wide sleeves|wide]] and [[long sleeves]] on the outer. His robe has a [[bandolier]] holding various tactical items and his [[dog tags]] attached, as well as having a [[chest protector]] attached, his robe also has the Strike Hawk [[emblem]] printed on the back and on the front left knee region. Footwear is a [[black footwear|black]] and [[white footwear|white]] [[knee boots]].

Depending on awakening level, he can be depicted wearing a [[grey scarf]], his bodysuit can look like a [[black undershirt]] when he is depicted in a [[portrait]] / [[upper body]] format. Uses a [[huge weapon|huge]] [[scythe]] as his weapon.

h4. List of Alternate Coatings ([[official alternate costume|alternative costumes]])
* [[chrome: arclight (dream eater) (punishing: gray raven)|Dream Eater]]

title: sophia:_silverfang_(pgr)
body:
A frame of [[Sophia (pgr)|]] from [[Punishing: Gray Raven]], [[cyborg]] in appearance.

h4. Appearance
The Silverfang frame is [[petite]] ([[flat chest]]) in body shape, has [[orange eyes]], [[dark skin]] ([[dark-skinned female]]) with [[short hair|short]] [[white hair]] in a [[bob cut]] style with [[asymmetrical bangs]]. She has [[bags under eyes]] and facial [[freckles]], her hair is adorned with five [[x hair ornament]]s. Both of her arms are [[mechanical arms|mechanical]], attached on her biceps, she also has two mechanical appendages ([[extra arms]]) from a device attached on her lower back, [[robot joints]] can be seen on her elbow, wrist, and on the extra mechanical arms.

Clothing consist of a [[white bodysuit|white]] [[skintight]] [[bodysuit]] with [[juliet sleeves]] and [[turtleneck]] [[high collar]] design. For legwear she wears a pair of [[toeless legwear|toeless]] [[white thighhighs|white]] [[thighhighs]] with [[no shoes]]. Other apparel elements include: a [[mechabare|mechanical part/device]] attached to her [[chest protector]], [[canister]]s attached to her back device, [[drum magazine]]s attached to the end of her extra mechanical arms. [[Dual wielding|Dual wields]] [[handgun|pistol handguns]] as her weapons.

h4. List of Alternate Coatings ([[official alternate costume|alternative costumes]])
* [[sophia: silverfang (chief mechanic) (punishing: gray raven)|Chief Mechanic]]
* [[sophia: silverfang (starry desert) (punishing: gray raven)|Starry Desert]]
* [[sophia: silverfang (mandala dance) (pgr)|Mandala Dance]]

* "GrayRavens wiki - Sophia: Silverfang Gallery":[https://grayravens.com/wiki/Sophia:_Silverfang/Gallery]

title: bianca_(pgr)
body:
A playable character of [[Punishing: Gray Raven]], a part of the Purifying Force of Babylonia. Voiced by [[Kawasumi Ayako]].[[kt._(kaisou-notagui)|]] and [[sila_(carpen)|]]

h4. Appearance
More mature in appearance amongst playable Constructs, Bianca has [[green eyes|olive green eyes]], and [[blonde hair|honey blonde]] [[very long hair]], a [[mole under eye|mole under left eye]], uses a [[bow (weapon)|]] as her weapon. In the Stigmata frame she has a [[pale skin|paler complexion]], [[purple eyes]] and platinum blonde hair, and uses a [[sword]] instead. She is sometimes depicted in a [[nun]]'s outfit, <spoiler>as it was her previous occupation</spoilers>.

h4. List of playable frames of Bianca

* [[bianca: veritas (pgr)|Bianca: Veritas]]

title: sophia_(pgr)
body:
A playable character of [[Punishing: Gray Raven]], a Construct in service to the Akdilek Commercial Alliance, currently acting as an envoy of ACA to Babylonia. Voiced by [[Koshimizu Ami]].

h4. Appearance
More [[petite]] in appearance amongst playable Constructs, Sophia has [[medium hair|medium]] [[white hair]], [[orange eyes]] and [[dark-skinned female|dark skintone]]. Has [[freckles]] on her cheeks.

h4. List of playable frames of Sophia
* [[sophia: silverfang (pgr)|Sophia: Silverfang]]

title: nanami:_pulse_(pgr)
body:
A frame of [[Nanami (pgr)|]] from [[Punishing: Gray Raven]], [[cyborg]] in appearance.

h4. Appearance
The Pulse frame features [[grey eyes]] with [[very long hair|very long]] [[grey hair]], [[bob cut|bob cut style]] on the front, upswept into a [[high ponytail]] at the back, also featuring [[French braid]]s, tied together by a mechanical tie and a [[hair ornament]]/[[headgear]]. All four limbs are [[mechanical]], [[mechanical arms]] connects above the elbow joint, [[mechanical legs]] connects above the knee, her feet are a pair of [[roller shoes|rollers]] with single wheel drive. She can be depicted carrying a [[spare tire|spare wheel]] on her back depending on awakening level.

Pulse wears a [[grey dress|grey]] and [[black dress|black]] [[multicolored dress|multicolored]] [[off-shoulder dress|off shoulder]] [[armored dress]] featuring a singular [[chest protector|chest protector plate]] and [[polka dot dress|polka]] patterns all over the dress. The dress is suspended by a [[choker]]. A [[yellow dress|yellow]] tertiary color can be introduced to the dress body depending on awakening level, as well as having/lack of [[thigh strap]]s with a [[thigh pouch]].

Uses a [[chainsword]] as her weapon.

h4. List of Alternate Coatings ([[official alternate costume|alternative costumes]])
* [[nanami: pulse (gray feathers: pulse) (pgr)|Gray Feathers: Pulse]]

h4. Appearance
Kamui has [[purple eyes]] and [[short hair|short]] [[blonde hair|blonde hair]] in both of his Construct Omniframes, he has a [[mechabare|mechanical]] device protruding above his right eye, similar to a [[fake horns|fake horn]]. Wields a [[two-handed]] [[greatsword]] as his weapon.

title: abby_(wuthering_waves)
body:
Character in [[Wuthering Waves]].

Abby is a flight capable sentient echo that resembles a white cat/rabbit, very laid back, always tired and hungry. Abby has [[heterochromia]] eyes, [[blue eyes|blue]] left and [[orange eyes|orange]] right. Has a [[tacet mark (wuthering waves)|]] on its [[forehead mark|forehead]] and wears a [[neck bell]].

The Hyperreal frame features sandy [[blonde hair|blonde]] [[short hair]], [[hair between eyes|bangs between eyes]], [[multicolored hair|hair]] [[gradient hair|gradients]] towards a paler shade of blonde at the tips. Hyperreal is more [[cyborg]]/[[android]] like in appearance, with more exposed [[mechabare]] on display, all four limbs are mechanical, [[mechanical arms]] and [[mechanical legs]] seemingly integrates into the torso.

His weapons include various of [[gun|firearms]] transformed from the briefcase he carries, depending on artist depiction it can range from [[handgun]], [[submachine gun]], [[rifle]]/[[sniper rifle]] and [[energy cannon]].

title: nanami:_storm_(pgr)
body:
A frame of [[Nanami (pgr)|]] from [[Punishing: Gray Raven]], [[cyborg]] in appearance.

h4. Appearance
Storm has [[grey eyes|grey eyes]], [[long_hair|long]] [[grey hair]] in a [[bob cut]] style on the front, a [[French braid]] at the back tied up by a [[black ribbon|black]] [[hair ribbon|ribbon]], and the overall length is [[very long hair|very long]], extending past the waist. Featuring [[mechanical]] elements such as a pair of [[small horns|small]] [[mechanical horns]] on her head, [[mechabare]] protecting face and neck, both arms are [[mechanical arms|mechanical]] up to the biceps, as well as having mechanical feet.

Storm frame wears a [[black dress|black]] [[print dress]] similar to the YoRHa style, featuring [[patterned clothing|pattern print on skirt]] and [[juliet sleeves]], sometimes depicted as a [[collared dress]] depending on awakening level. Other apparel elements such as [[black pantyhose]] for legwear, and a [[chest harness]] with small [[pouch]]es attached. Outfit elements can include an extra [[belt pouch]], a dress adding a [[corset]], extra [[headgear]] resembling animal ears, fake small horns being replaced by a [[spiked hairband]] and/or multiple [[floating object|floating]] O rings depending on awakening level. Uses a [[chainsword]] as weapon.

h4. List of Alternate Coatings ([[official alternate costume|alternative costumes]])

Other notable facial features includes a [[barcode]] [[forehead tattoo]] and a [[scar on cheek|scar on left cheek]]. Typically depicted with only the left arm being [[mechanical arms|mechanical]] ([[single mechanical arm]]), though depending on awakening level of the frame, both arms can be mechanical.

Apparel consist of several layers, inner-most is a black [[bodysuit]] with [[mechanical]] elements, followed by a dark brown [[waistcoat]], outerwear is a [[brown coat|brown/beige]] [[trench coat]], [[black pants|black suit pants]] and [[black footwear|black]] [[boots]]. Other note worthy apparels are [[harness]] and wearing [[multiple belts]].

[[dual wielding|Dual wields]] [[dagger]]s/[[machete]]s for weapons.

body: Or simply "[[Super Sonic]]" is the super form that [[Sonic the Hedgehog|Sonic]] takes in the comic book series [[Sonic the Comic]]. This form is known more commonly by fans as "Fleetway Super Sonic". Unlike the [[Sonic (series)|video game]] depictions of Super Sonic, this form is a psychotic demon-like entity who manifests himself in Sonic's body under conditions of extreme stress or exposure to chaos energy.

title: bike_shorts
body:
Tight, form-fitting athletic shorts composed of nylon and Spandex that reach about mid-thigh.

The primary purposes of bike shorts are to compress muscles (particularly the groin and thighs), prevent chafing, help remove sweat, keep muscles warm, and keep male genitals in place.  There are two similar appearing types of these, compression shorts and bike shorts. Both types may be used without underwear, depending on if they were designed to act as underwear.

On Danbooru, the most common version depicted are compression shorts, which are used for a variety of sports and athletic activities.  Compression shorts are similar to bike shorts, but aren't designed with biking in mind and thus lack things like padding to reduce discomfort from long rides. Compression shorts are sometimes used by some women to conceal their [[panties]] beneath their [[skirt]], especially for those in women's sports where their uniform has a skirt, such as [[field hockey]] or [[lacrosse]]. 

In some places, these are known as spats for some reason. If you were searching for the Jazz Age footwear, go to [[spats (footwear)]].

h4. Types

* [[Bib shorts]]

h4. See also 

* [[Compression sleeve]]
* [[Shorts]] 
* [[Tag Group:Attire]]

A flight capable TD, Mourning Aix has a bird-like head, Eastern dragon-like body, two pairs of wings, and two forearms with human-like hands. Has purple body, feathers with white feather wings, certain body part glows gold.

title: irn-bru
body:
Originally Iron Brew, this is a [[Scotland|Scottish]] [[soda]] that is described as "Scotland's other national drink" after [[Scotch whisky]]. Glasgow-based A.G. Barr manufactures the drink, first introduced in 1901. It has long been the most popular soda in Scotland ahead of the likes of [[Coca-Cola]], [[Pepsi]] and [[Fanta]] and is also sold elsewhere in the United Kingdom. In addition, it can also be found internationally in areas where there is a sizable Scottish community.

title: we_live_in_a_society_social_media_reactions_(meme)
body:
"We Live In a Society Social Media Reactions" refers to a series of images that juxtapose a popular item with a complex but underappreciated one, using photoshopped social media reactions to highlight the disparity.
This format first appeared on May 12th, 2018, when Twitter user 660th posted an image of [[Mickey Mouse]] with positive reactions next to a detailed illustration of a mouse with no reactions, captioned "We live in a society".

Note that this meme is unrelated to the [[We Live in a Society_(meme)|]] meme that involves the [[Joker_(dc)|]] and an usually more "edgy" theme.

h4. Original
* !asset #23224283
h4. External Links:
* "Twitter: @660th: We live in a society (archived)":[https://web.archive.org/web/20180515014633/https://twitter.com/660th/status/995384248440942592]
* "KnowYourMeme: We Live In a Society Social Media Reactions":[https://knowyourmeme.com/memes/we-live-in-a-society-social-media-reactions]

title: eddie_brock
body: Edward "Eddie" Charles Allan Brock is a fictional character appearing in American comic books published by [[marvel|Marvel Comics]]. The character was created by David Michelinie and Todd McFarlane, making a cameo appearance in Web of [[Spider-Man (series)|Spider-Man]] #18 (September 1986), before making his first full appearance in The Amazing Spider-Man #300 (May 1988) as the most well-known host of the [[venom (marvel)|Venom]] symbiote.

title: venom_(marvel)
body:
A shapeshifting villain/anti-hero from the [[Spider-Man (series)|]] series of comic books published by [[Marvel]].

Venom is an alien symbiote that initially attaches itself to [[Peter Parker]], leading to the creation of the Symbiote Suit (or the black Spider-Man suit). However, the power boost granted by the alien entity proves to corrupt Peter's mind, and he rids himself of it - leading the scorned creature to take over Parker's rival, [[Eddie Brock]], and swear revenge, eventually settling into the role of an anti-hero.

The symbiote was first introduced as Spider-Man's new black costume in The Amazing Spider-Man #252 (May 1984) as part of a story called "Homecoming!" The story takes place after Spider-Man's return from the events of the miniseries Secret Wars, where he first obtains the black costume. The full first appearance of Venom is in The Amazing Spider-Man #300 (May 1988), after the symbiote bonds with Eddie Brock.

title: transparent
body:
An object other than clothing that actually, physically allows some amount of light to pass through it. If a normally opaque object such as a wooden desk is rendered partly invisible by artistic fiat, that's [[x-ray]].

If some article of clothing is transparent, use [[see-through clothes]] instead. If a person seems to be disappearing, [[fading]] may be appropriate as well; for a character's skin that's transparent, see [[see-through body]].
h4. See also

title: bandura
body:
A bandura (Ukrainian: бандура) is a [[Ukraine|Ukrainian]] plucked-string folk-[[instrument]]. It combines elements of the [[zither]] and [[lute_(instrument)|]] and, up until the 1940s, was also often called a kobza. Early instruments (c. 1700) had 5 to 12 strings and resembled lutes. In the 20th century, the number of strings increased initially to 31 strings (1926), then to 56 strings – 68 strings on modern "concert" instruments (1954).

title: chiang_kai-shek
body: A prominent leader of the Republic of [[China]]. After having led the country starting in 1928, he was [[chinese civil war|defeated]] by [[Mao Zedong]]'s communist forces in 1949, from then on serving as the leader of the government-in-exile on [[Taiwan]] until his death in 1975. Known for his charismatic leadership yet his inability suppress the widespread corruption within his country, which led to his eventual downfall on mainland China.

title: banjo
body:
A usually fretted stringed [[instrument]] having a narrow neck and a hollow circular body. It can have anywhere from 3 to 6 strings. 
H4. Examples
* !asset #23222172: "source: Wikimedia":[https://commons.m.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Bluegrass_banjo.png#mw-jump-to-license]

title: erhu
body:
Chinese pronunciation: [i]Erhu[/i]
Japanese: [i]Niko[/i]

A violin-like Chinese musical [[instrument]] with two strings and a hexagonal resonator. Its bow is attached to the two strings and can never be separate from the instrument itself. It is believed to be the instrument of forgotten [i]Touhou[/i] character [[Satsuki Rin]].

title: clear_sky
body:
A [[sky]] that is nearly or completely devoid of [[cloud|clouds]], regardless of the time of the day.

h4. See also
* [[sun shower]]

title: sunlight
body:
The light of the sun.

[[Sunbeam]] (crepuscular rays) is where light rays stream through gaps in clouds or between other objects. These are columns of sunlit air separated by darker cloud-shadowed regions. (See post #438675)

[[Sunburst]] is for designs or figures of burst of [[sunlight]], but may not necessarily be the actual sun (See post #645306)

For tagging purposes, keep in mind that a particular image may satisfy one or more of the specific terms mentioned above.

h4. See also

* [[dappled sunlight]]
* [[sunbeam]]
* [[sunburst]]
* [[sun shower]]
* [[lens flare]]

h4. External links

* "Dictionary.com: Sunlight":https://dictionary.reference.com/browse/sunlight
* "Wikipedia: Crepuscular rays":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crepuscular_rays

Notably has two names for its associated [[E.G.O (PROJECT MOON)|]]:

title: sun_shower
body:
A meteorological phenomenon in which [[rain]] falls while the [[sunlight|sun is shining]]. It can sometimes occur in a partially [[cloudy sky]] or even in a [[clear sky|clear]] [[blue sky|sky]]. It is usually the result of winds blowing the airborne raindrops into an area where there are no clouds.

One of the possible explanations for one of its Japanese names, 狐の嫁入り ([i]Kitsune no yomeiri[/i]), which literally means "fox's wedding," comes from the old belief that such rains are inexplicable and unnatural. In Japan, foxes (or kitsune) were believed to shapeshift, trick people, or cause them to hallucinate. It was believed that the rain fell to prevent people from seeing a fox wedding procession that took place during the day.

h4. External links
* "Wikipedia: Sunshower":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sunshower
* "Wikipedia: Kitsune no yomeiri":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kitsune_no_yomeiri

title: faust_(project_moon)
body:
[[Limbus Company]] character.

Sinner No.02 of [[Limbus Company]]. Named after and based off of the titular character "Faust":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Faust from German folklore, along with her creation [[Mephistopheles (project moon)|]].

She has [[medium hair|medium length]] [[white hair]] and [[blue eyes]]. She wears the uniform of all Limbus Company sinners, consisting of a [[red necktie]], [[black vest]], [[belt]], [[black pants]] but wears a [[turtleneck sweater]] instead of the standard [[white shirt|white]] [[collared shirt]] and a [[torn coat|torn]] [[black coat]] she wears on her [[coat on shoulders|shoulders]]. 

She wields a [[zweihander]] in her base identity with the German word 'WALPURGISNACHT' written on its blade. 

h4. Official art

* !post #5028568

title: bohrok_(bionicle)
body:
A race of insectoid robots who travel in swarms, their purpose is to clean the island of Mata Nui as preparation for his awakening. They come in 6 different breeds, each with their own elemental power.

These include:

[[Tahnok_(bionicle)|]], Bohrok of Fire
[[Gahlok_(bionicle)|]], Bohrok of Water
[[Lehvak_(bionicle)|]], Bohrok of Acid
[[Pahrak_(bionicle)|]], Bohrok of Stone
[[Kohrak_(bionicle)|]], Bohrok of Ice
[[Nuhvok_(bionicle)|]], Bohrok of Earth

They are led by two Queens known as the "Bahrag" named [[Cahdok_(bionicle)|Cahdok]] and [[Gahdok_(bionicle)|Gahdok]].

There also exist and elite group of Bohrok called the Bohrak-Kal who wield a different set of powers.

[[Tahnok-Kal_(bionicle)|]], Bohrok-Kal of Lighting
[[Gahlok-Kal_(bionicle)|]], Bohrok-Kal of Magnetism 
[[Lehvak-Kal_(bionicle)|]], Bohrok-Kal of Vacuum
[[Pahrak-Kal_(bionicle)|]], Bohrok-Kal of Plasma
[[Kohrak-Kal_(bionicle)|]], Bohrok-Kal of Sonic
[[Nuhvok-Kal_(bionicle)|]], Bohrok-Kal of Gravity
